articles.title: Death toll from flooding in western Europe climbs above 180 - CBC.ca
articles.description: Rescue workers laboured to deal with damage laid bare by receding water on Saturday as the death toll from disastrous flooding in western Europe rose above 180 and thoughts turned to the lengthy job of rebuilding devastated communities.
